text: Layda Elena Sansores San Román (born August 7, 1945) is a Mexican politician. She is a member of the National Regeneration Movement. In 2021, she was elected as Governor of Campeche. She was the mayor of Álvaro Obregón, one of the boroughs of Mexico City. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican politicians Category:People from Campeche
title: Layda Sansores
